page.title: 08DARTMOUTH'S LOCAL PAPER
page.content:
{The Dartmouth Chronicle }sold its first newspaper in{1854.}The chronicle is more popular now than it was over a century ago.However many people say it was a better newspaper a couple of months ago when the news was just about{Dartmouth.}It now contains news about Kingsbridge and many areas around Dartmouth.Many other people say they would recommend it to a newcomer.
The{chronicle}is not a paper that would interest children.The reporter of the chronicle says that she hopes in the future she'll be able to make about a page for{children}to include puzzles and games.Most people get the chronicle every week not because it is a particually good paper but for the local news. People's favourite articles vary. Some like the sports, many read the advertisements.
